DOC.brief_summary: Clinical, controlled, randomized, prospective study. Ventral hernias between 2(1.5)cm and 7 cm, laparoscopic surgery with intraperitoneal onlay mesh. Three randomization groups of 25 patients giving a total of 75 patients. Mesh is fixated with either Protack, Securestrap or Glubran II. Primary outcome: postoperative pain on the 2nd postoperative day. Secondary outcomes: pain, quality of life, recurrence and adhesions at 1, 6, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 60 months postoperative.
DOC.brief_title: 3 Fixation Devices in Laparoscopic Ventral Herniotomy
DOC.criteria: ventral hernia 2(1,5) < dia > 7 cm danish speaking of sound mind bmi < 35 ASA 3 or less, no contra indication against laparoscopy other size hernias, no danish, bmi > 35
